description: Returns information about the overall health of the specified environment. The DescribeEnvironmentHealth operation is only available with AWS Elastic Beanstalk Enhanced Health.

parameters.name: EnvironmentName
parameters.description: Specify the environment by name. You must specify either this or an EnvironmentName, or both.

parameters.name: EnvironmentId
parameters.description: Specify the environment by ID. You must specify either this or an EnvironmentName, or both.

parameters.name: AttributeNames
parameters.description: Specify the response elements to return. To retrieve all attributes, set to All. If no attribute names are specified, returns the name of the environment. (string) ---

nested_items.name: EnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The environment's name.

nested_items.name: HealthStatus
nested_items.description: The health status of the environment. For example, Ok.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The environment's operational status. Ready, Launching, Updating, Terminating, or Terminated.

nested_items.name: Color
nested_items.description: The health color of the environment.

nested_items.name: Causes
nested_items.description: Descriptions of the data that contributed to the environment's current health status.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ApplicationMetrics
nested_items.description: Application request metrics for the environment.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The amount of time that the metrics cover (usually 10 seconds). For example, you might have 5 requests ( request_count) within the most recent time slice of 10 seconds ( duration).

nested_items.name: RequestCount
nested_items.description: Average number of requests handled by the web server per second over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: StatusCodes
nested_items.description: Represents the percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in each type of status code response.

nested_items.name: Status2xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 2xx (200, 201, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status3xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 3xx (300, 301, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status4xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 4xx (400, 401, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: Status5xx
nested_items.description: The percentage of requests over the last 10 seconds that resulted in a 5xx (500, 501, etc.) status code.

nested_items.name: P999
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 0.1 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P99
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 1 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P95
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 5 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P90
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 10 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P85
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 15 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P75
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 25 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P50
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 50 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: P10
nested_items.description: The average latency for the slowest 90 percent of requests over the last 10 seconds.

nested_items.name: InstancesHealth
nested_items.description: Summary health information for the instances in the environment.

nested_items.name: NoData
nested_items.description: Grey. AWS Elastic Beanstalk and the health agent are reporting no data on an instance.

nested_items.name: Unknown
nested_items.description: Grey. AWS Elastic Beanstalk and the health agent are reporting an insufficient amount of data on an instance.

nested_items.name: Pending
nested_items.description: Grey. An operation is in progress on an instance within the command timeout.

nested_items.name: Ok
nested_items.description: Green. An instance is passing health checks and the health agent is not reporting any problems.

nested_items.name: Info
nested_items.description: Green. An operation is in progress on an instance.

nested_items.name: Warning
nested_items.description: Yellow. The health agent is reporting a moderate number of request failures or other issues for an instance or environment.

nested_items.name: Degraded
nested_items.description: Red. The health agent is reporting a high number of request failures or other issues for an instance or environment.

nested_items.name: Severe
nested_items.description: Red. The health agent is reporting a very high number of request failures or other issues for an instance or environment.

nested_items.name: RefreshedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the health information was retrieved.
